author: apadilla
msg: added and updated licenses in dotnet modules

author: rnewson
msg: ensure write_streamed_attachment bails on negative LenLeft values
While Filipe has identified the fix for COUCHDB-1021, this patch will
ensure that no other bug will cause negative values to be passed to
this function, in turn leading to database inflation problems, etc.

author: rnewson
msg: ensure write_streamed_attachment bails on negative LenLeft values
While Filipe has identified the fix for COUCHDB-1021, this patch will
ensure that no other bug will cause negative values to be passed to
this function, in turn leading to database inflation problems, etc.

author: ashish
msg: 2. Added condition to avoid null pointer exception.

author: jacopoc
msg: Removed unused handler from controller files; replaced handlers that were still using the old ScreenWidgetViewHandler with the current MacroScreenViewHandler; deprecated compress.HTML property with output specific properties like screen.compress; this fixes a rather important issue happening when the compress.HTML setting is set to true: non html output screens like for example tab delimited exports were messed up.
